long_description: Great for reducing clouds of flying chalk at the gym or on your home mini-wall, the Super Chalk Sock is filled with Metolius Super Chalk. Synthetic fabric allows easy flow for excellent coverage. Original chalk specifically formulated for rock climbing. Drying agent is added to the highest-quality magnesium carbonate for maximum sweat absorption and friction. Chalk Sock is not refillable.
short_description: Great for reducing clouds of flying chalk at the gym or on your home mini-wall, the Super Chalk Sock is filled with Metolius Super Chalk.
